Reviews.Title: “Good location but don't expect anything about the rooms”

Reviews.Content: ensuite booked basic airconditioning summer super hot friends couldnt sleep woke soaked windows friend worried safety nightthe bathroom shower theres computer surprisingly granny computer fine internet swap air conditioner location selling walking distance city center walked main street gran via hotel streets looked grand suppose couldnt choice budget note reception 30 walk street look sign jc black board hanging building opposite street apartment

Reviews.Title: “great location but bad quality”
Reviews.Author: Tyler L
Reviews.Content: hotel located middle city centre hard sign hotel reception building hard air conditioning madrid boiling couldnt sleep night cuz hot floor dirty shower sadly dont recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Sophie C
Reviews.Content: hostel value money stayed 2 nights private bathroom clean comfortable free drinks yoghurts minibar arrival cleaned day slightly doesnt matter sleep perfect location 2 minute walk puerta del sol negative walls thin people noise definitely hear definitely stay
